2117.note: One-line fix: vscode.Uri.parse('file:///'+path) -> vscode.Uri.file(path). CI pending (0 checks reported).

2007_2013.note: Fix: splitSegmentsWithKnownLeaf uses DisplayName as hint to avoid splitting on . or + within test names. CI pending (0 checks reported).

1991.note: Fix: 60-second safety timeout on dotnet test --list-tests. Uses CancellationToken.mergeTokens + setTimeout to cancel after 60s if process hangs.

proposed_improvements.description: Fix VS Code engine version in release/package.json from ^0.10.0 to ^1.52.0
Filed issue #2132: Update @types/vscode from 1.52 to current
Fix Test Explorer hierarchy for test names containing . or + (affects #2007, #2013, #1960)
Fix: 60-second safety timeout to dotnet test --list-tests (affects #1991)

notes: Issue #2122: dotnet path wrong on Ubuntu - upstream FSAC issue
Issue #2125: region folding - FSAC folding provider doesn't support //#region markers
Issue #2118: Option.bind breakpoint issue - well-explained by TheAngryByrd + baronfel (upstream .NET debugger/sequence points). No further comment needed.
Issue #2116: parentheses highlight entire expression - commented pointing to FSAC UnnecessaryParentheses range fix needed upstream
Issue #2111: No test projects found error - commented with workaround (AutoDiscoverTestsOnLoad:false) and root cause (FSAC AdaptiveServerState.fs#L2715)
Issue #2101: inlay hint max length - well-handled, no need to comment; labeled enhancement
Issue #2123: operator tooltip not shown for operators starting with '.' - likely FSAC upstream issue
Issue #2126: xUnit test names garbled with float InlineData - Copilot PR #2127 exists (draft, stale since Feb 11)
Issue #2121: LineLens crash on rapid setting toggle - asked for stack trace
Issue #2108: do! on partially applied function shows no error - upstream FCS/FSAC issue
Issue #2115: Cannot go to definition in .NET 10 Devcontainer - asked reporter to share their PR (from Dec 2025 comment saying they created a PR)
Issue #1960: Test host crashes with duplicate test method names - labeled bug; related to segmentRegex issue; Martin521 already identified root cause
Issue #2099: Bad indentation in list comprehension - labeled bug; MangelMaxime correctly directed to Fantomas
Issue #2086: MSBuild project graph MSB0001 error - suggested disabling FSharp.enableMSBuildProjectGraph
Issue #2046: Non-ASCII Windows username prevents Ionide from starting - suggested --extensions-dir workaround
Issue #2041: Go to test source not shown for C# test files - explained C# test source nav not supported
Issue #2073: Missing |null annotation in tooltip - baronfel has active FSAC PR #1353; well-handled
PR #2049: FSI ignore comments - waiting on author jkone27 to respond to vzarytovskii suggestion
PR #2079: draft POC for different base paths - TheAngryByrd, stale since Apr 2025
PR #2129: Repo Assist fix for test URI on Linux/Mac - CI: 0 checks (may not run on external branches)
PR #2131: Repo Assist fix for VS Code engine version - CI: 0 checks (may not run on external branches)
PR #2133: Repo Assist fix for test hierarchy (.+separator) - CI: 0 checks (may not run on external branches)
PR (branch: fix-list-tests-timeout-1991): Repo Assist fix for dotnet test --list-tests timeout - pending PR creation
Issue #1892: new tests not recognized until project reload - commented with Refresh button workaround; added help wanted label
Issue #2007: Expecto '+' in test names creates false hierarchy - FIX PR #2133 submitted
Issue #2013: '.' in test names creates extra hierarchy nodes - FIX PR #2133 submitted
Task 8: Last release was 7.31.1 on 2026-02-05. No release needed.
Issue #2119: DotRush as alternative - commented explaining requiredExtensions check vs coreclr debugger adapter; awaiting maintainer decision

Issue #2078: Test Discovery breaking design-time builds - well-discussed by contributors; baronfel+farlee2121 agree on fix approach (separate BaseIntermediateOutputPath). No Repo Assist comment needed.
Issue #2069: TestingPlatformDotnetTestSupport - 15 comments, extensively discussed. Incompatible with Ionide's dotnet test approach. No comment needed.

Issue #2020: Test Runner shows workload updates - commented pointing to getEnv in dotnetTest in TestExplorer.fs; suggested DOTNET_CLI_WORKLOADS_UPDATE_NOTIFY_DISABLE=1; awaiting baronfel confirmation of exact env var name.
getOrMakeHierarchyPath (line 1098) still uses splitSegments (no display name available from TestResult/TRX) - could be improved in future but requires adding DisplayName to TestResult
Issue #2120: FreeBSD - no type hints. Asked for diagnostics (F# output panel, .NET SDK, VS Code build type). FreeBSD not officially supported.
Issue #2053: .fsi syntax highlighting broken by unparenthesized tuples - grammar is from ionide/ionide-fsgrammar; commented redirecting to that repo
CI: 0 check runs on Repo Assist PR branches - likely repo CI only runs on approved PRs or main branch pushes. Normal behavior for security.
Issue #1986: Unreferenced assembly errors for basic types (System.String etc) - commented suggesting update to 7.31.1, clear FSAC cache, check .fsproj SDK declaration. No maintainer comments.
Issue #2044: fsi.SendSelection not found - commented with troubleshooting steps (reload window, check activation, verify keybinding command ID 'fsharp.sendSelectionToFsi'). No maintainer comments.
Issue #2011: Error highlighting on method calls - MangelMaxime identified as FSAC upstream semantic token range bug. Well-handled, no Repo Assist comment needed.
Issue #2037: Weird interpolated string highlighting - baronfel already investigated, reporter clarified scope. Well-handled, no Repo Assist comment needed.
Issue #2009: No default debug configuration - TheAngryByrd+roboz0r provided detailed workarounds. Well-handled, no Repo Assist comment needed.
Issue #2012: FSI Watcher not displaying - the watcher is EXPERIMENTAL and requires FSharp.addFsiWatcher:true setting. Commented explaining the setup steps. Fixed likely user error (prompt dismissed).

Issue #1991: Refresh tests stuck when project has no tests - dotnet test --list-tests hangs on empty test projects. Commented with workarounds (Cancel button, AutoDiscoverTestsOnLoad:false). Root cause: process never fires close event for empty test projects. FIX PR submitted (fix-list-tests-timeout-1991).

Issue #1875: Remote SSH 'No typecheck results' - commented with diagnostic steps (F# output panel, .NET SDK in PATH for non-interactive sessions, dotnetRoot config). 0 prior comments, reporter vilinski
Issue #1798: Casing mismatch on Windows (.fsproj vs filesystem) - commented explaining FSAC path normalization limitation; suggested fixing casing in .fsproj. 0 prior comments, reporter da9l
